price: $100 for Full Pass, $50 for Party Pass
location: Ukrainian Cultural Centre, 3277 Douglas St, Saanich, BC V8Z 3K9, Canada
description: Join Becky Mowat in celebrating her birthday with dancing, workshops, and a potluck. Featuring Elvis, a Kizomba and UrbanKiz instructor, and DJ Olu Shogo. All proceeds go towards “Casa del Corazon”. Schedule includes social dancing, workshops, practica, and a potluck over two days.
